scripts.build: tsc ./build.ts --esModuleInterop && node ./build.js --step=prebuild && node ./build.js --step=build && npm run tsc && node ./build.js --step=postbuild
scripts.build_dist: tsc ./build.ts --esModuleInterop && node ./build.js --step=build && npm run tsc && node ./build.js --step=postbuild
scripts.build_api: tsc ./API/build.ts --esModuleInterop && cd ./API && node ./build.js --step=prebuild && node ./build.js --step=build && npm run tsc && cd ./build && npm link && cd .. && node ./build.js --step=postbuild
scripts.dist: npm run modules && npm run clean && npm install
scripts.publish: npm run bump && npm run dist
scripts.postinstall: npm install typescript --global && npm install typedoc --global && tsc ./bin/postinstall.ts --esModuleInterop && npx patch-package && npm run build_api && npm link modloader64_api && npm run build_api && npm link modloader64_api && tsc ./build.ts --esModuleInterop && node ./build.js --step=installEmulator && tsc ./bin/index.ts --esModuleInterop && tsc ./bin/paker.ts --esModuleInterop && node ./bin/paker.js -i ./Mupen64Plus/emulator.pak -o ./Mupen64Plus && npm run build && node ./bin/postinstall.js && typedoc --out ./docs ./src && typedoc --out ./API/docs ./API/src
